name: lib/ElectroPhone.js
ElectroPhone
description: ElectroPhone Library.
examples:
const AudioCtx = window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext;
const synth = new ElectroPhone(new AudioCtx(), { spectrum: false });

name: constructor
description: Create a playable web synthesizer instance.

name: getModules
description: Returns current synth modules configuration object.

properties.name: <module_id>
properties.description: one ModuleProperties for each created module.

name: create
description: Create a new synth module.

throws.description: throw error when module with id is already created.

name: update
description: Update the synth module by id.

throws.description: throw error when module with id is not found.

name: master
description: Update the master module.

name: adsr
description: Update the ADSR module.

name: destroy
description: Destroy the synth module by id.

throws.description: throw error when module with id is not found.

name: play
description: Start playing the input frequency.

name: stop
description: Stop playing the input frequency.

name: link
description: Link two modules, connect source module to target module.

throws.description: throw error when source is master.
throw error when source module is not found.
throw error when target module is not found.

name: getModuleProperties
description: Get module properties by type.

name: describeModules
description: Describe all ElectroPhone modules with parameters configuration.

name: getFrequency
description: Get frequency float value calculated from given note and octave.

params.name: note
params.description: note char indicator. sharp char for semi-tones.

name: getNotes
description: Get complete notes list.

name: lib/TypeDefinition.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} ElectroPhoneProperties
 * @property {boolean} spectrum - set if there is a spectrum attached.
 * @property {function(data: Array): undefined} updateSpectrum - on receive data callback.
 * @property {function(): undefined} resetSpectrum - on stop data callback.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} AudioContext
 * @see https://developer.mozilla.org/it/docs/Web/API/AudioContext
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} ModuleProperties
 * @property {Object} props - key value list of each module property.
 * @property {String} type - the type of the module.
 */

properties.name: spectrum
properties.description: set if there is a spectrum attached.

properties.name: props
properties.description: key value list of each module property.

name: test/ElectroPhone.js
describe0
description: ElectroPhone

name: it1
description: should have a ElectroPhone function

name: it2
description: should create a ElectroPhone instance

name: it3
description: should have a isPlaying property

name: it4
description: should have a method to get modules

name: it5
description: should have master and adsr modules created

name: it6
description: should have a create method to add new module

name: it7
description: should fail if try to create an existing module

name: it8
description: should have a update method to update a module

name: it9
description: should fail if try to update a module that doesn't exist

name: it10
description: should have a master method to update the master module

name: it11
description: should have a adsr method to update the adsr module

name: it12
description: should have a destroy method to destroy a module

name: it13
description: should fail if try to destroy a module that doesn't exist

name: it14
description: should have a play method that doesn't start if no frequency given

name: it15
description: should have a play method that start playing given frequency

name: it16
description: should have a stop method that doesn't stop if no frequency given

name: it17
description: should have a stop method that stop playing given frequency

name: it18
description: should have a link method to link two modules

name: it19
description: should fail if try to link the master module to anything

name: it20
description: should fail if try to link a source that doesn't exist

name: it21
description: should fail if try to link a source to a target that doesn't exist

name: it22
description: should have a static getModuleProperties method to get module properties by type

name: it23
description: should have a static describeModules method to describe all ElectroPhone modules with properties

name: it24
description: should have a static getFrequency method to calculate frequency value from note and octave

name: it25
description: should have a static getNotes method to get notes list
